title: Apple Silicon: Here’s everything you need to know about Apple’s own SoCs
content:
On top of making high-end consumer hardware including iPhones, iPads, and more, Apple also makes a series of system on a chip (SoC). These SoCs are designed to be used in Apple’s own consumer hardware products and it mainly uses ARM architecture. In addition to the new Mac computers, a variety of different Apple products

The post Apple Silicon: Here’s everything you need to know about Apple’s own SoCs appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at Apple silicon. We'll be discussing both A-series and as M-series chips and dive deep into their specs.
